extendedInfo.description: Lynette's conniving husband has cheated her out of her family business! What can an enterprising young woman like her do? Get revenge! Use your business savvy to help Lynette repurchase her company and send her husband to the slammer. Buy, develop and sell commercial properties to make a profit; build attractions that increase your income; and keep your eye on the bottom line as you purchase materials and hire workers. The point-and-tap fun of Hotel Mogul will have you laughing all the way to the bank!GAME FEATURES:â Five exotic settingsâ 35 levelsâ Four mini-gameâ Six kinds of hotelsâ Vibrant graphics and sound!--------More fun games from Alawar:â GOURMANIA â Become the world's top chef in this addictive hidden object smash hit!â SUNSHINE ACRES - Don't pass up your chance to farm one of the most beautiful places on Earth!--------FIND US: www.facebook.com/AlawarEntertainmentFOLLOW US: www.twitter.com/alawargamesBe the first to hear about our new games and awesome contests!

reviews.title: Absorbing enough
reviews.comment: If a little one dimensional.   Presents enough maths challenges,  combined with need for speed,  to eat up a few of your hours. The levels seem a bit random at times and the filler / minigames are pointless. How about replacing these with more depth to the main game?  Minor quibbles tho to an otherwise good game.
reviews.author: nigel owen

reviews.title: xoom
reviews.comment: Flickers way to much hurts my eyes this flickering could possibly trigger a stroke you have my money now fix! Do not buy until they fix this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: For the price this really is a good game. Upgraded from free to show support and was pleasantly surprised with full game. We need more like this. N1.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great game. Runs smooth. Wish there was a content upgrade. Had this game since day one and have 3 stars on all levels.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great game! So many levels, very nice graphics, entertaining to play. Definitely worth purchasing! Looks perfect on my Samsung Captivate.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: HTC wildfire - cannot see entire playing screen, some buttons cut off/unable to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The light version said that you wouldn\'t kept being pressured to buy. Buy I purchased game and it didn\'t let me go past level 11
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Get it sorted
reviews.comment: Downloaded after playing demo. Now when I play the game half the screen is cut off. Tho turns out theirs a tablet version of the game shame the in game purchase this game link dost take you to that or in the info in the game dost tell you theirs different versions

reviews.comment: Brilliant until i bought then wouldnt download had to refund customer service useless

reviews.comment: Shows white background behind the buildings making it difficult to play since updating to Gingerbread. Plz fix!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The scoring system doesn\'t add up. I find myself stuck @ level 10. The time is also short for doing things that needs to be done for a gold star.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Last level
reviews.comment: Getting to last level is too hard....I have majority gold stars and still don\'t have enough....make its little easier
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very good game. One issue on Evo: exiting game \"freezes\" phone. Solution: hit on/off button 2-3 times to un-freeze. * Still, it\'s annoying!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This game is all glitchy and it froze up my droid2 then it would not give me a refund when uninstalled
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Complete Waste of a $1.99
reviews.comment: App instantly crashed on my brand new Android tablet. Only downloaded it because it specifially said it was compatible with my device. Only good thing I can say so far is that I\'m working with customer service for a refund and she has been great. (Even better when my refund goes through!) Would give the app zero stars if possible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great game! Cant understand what all the fuss is about?! Works perfectly on Galaxy S 2. More levels tho please!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 5 Star Game!!!!!
reviews.comment: Works fantastic on S3!!! Good Challenges....good graphics. Didn\'t have freezes or errors!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs update!
reviews.comment: Aside from the fact that it doesnt save the game if interrupted, the scoring system sucks... After the first 10 levels its impossible to get an expert score bc its an unrealistic amount of time given to succeed. And now i find myself stuck on level 23 with no way to beat it... I have tried everything and it is impossible...was having fun until that level and i would have given 5 stars but now im tempted to uninstall if there is no update soon! Please fix these gliches!
reviews.author: Stephanie Levine

reviews.comment: Works awful on g2x. Freezes, bad transitions from one screen to the next, seems like the picture is constantly flashing and can\'t tell how this is hd
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Tried the lite version of this one on my droid to see if the screen fit and it ran great. So buying it has been great! Fun game! Works on Droid!
reviews.author: A Google User
